alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 9:38PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Simpson, Smith, eastern Lincoln, Lawrence, Covington and Jefferson Davis Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 937 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pineville to near Clem to East Lincoln. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... East Lincoln and Clem around 945 PM CDT. Prentiss, Topeka, Lone Star and Ruth around 950 PM CDT. Jayess and Center Ridge around 955 PM CDT. Carson around 1000 PM CDT. Melba around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sylvarena, New Hebron, Seminary, Mize, Silver Creek and Bassfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. These winds may occur even before thunder is heard. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson; Smith
